title: LOL: Hasse Toh Phasse
overview: Hosted by Boman Irani and Arshad Warsi, 10 of India's most entertaining comedians face a unique challenge - spend 6 hours together while doing whatever ut takes to break the other contenders. In this one of a kind comedy battle,a laugh, giggle, or smile could get you eliminated, and only the one that can keep a straight face to the finish will be crowned "Last One Laughing".
